fr.sii.ogham.email.builder.javamail

Class DefaultJavaMailConfigurer

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sii.ogham.email.builder.javamail.DefaultJavaMailConfigurer

  • public final class DefaultJavaMailConfigurer
extends Object
    Default JavaMail configurer that is automatically applied every time a MessagingBuilder instance is created through MessagingBuilder.standard().

    The configurer has a priority of 50000 in order to be applied after templating configurers.

    This configurer is applied only if javax.mail.Transport and javax.mail.internet.MimeMessage are present in the classpath. If not present, JavaMail implementation is not registered at all.

    This configurer inherits environment configuration (see BuildContext).

    This configurer applies the following configuration:

    • Configures host and port:
      • It uses one of "ogham.email.javamail.host", "mail.smtp.host" or "mail.hofromst" property if defined for mail server host address (IP or hostname)
      • It uses one of "ogham.email.javamail.port", "mail.smtp.port" or "mail.port" property if defined for mail server port. Default port is 25
    • Configures authentication:
      • If property "ogham.email.javamail.authenticator.username" and "ogham.email.javamail.authenticator.password" are defined, then an UsernamePasswordAuthenticator is used to handle username/password authentication
    • Configures encoding:
      • It uses "ogham.email.javamail.body.charset" property value as charset for email body if defined. Default charset is UTF-8
    • Configures mimetype detection:
      • Uses Apache Tika to detect mimetype
      • Explicitly use "text/html" mimetype instead of more specific ones like "application/xhtml" (XHTML)
    Author:
    Aur√©lien Baudet
